remarks:
Law of identity (reflexivity of class equality).  Theorem 6.4 of [Quine] p. 41. This is part of Frege's eighth axiom per Proposition 54 of [Frege1879] p. 50; see also ~ biid .  This law is thought to have originated with Aristotle (_Metaphysics_, Zeta, 17, 1041 a, 10-20).  (Thanks to Stefan Allan and BJ for this information.)  (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.) (Revised by BJ, 14-Oct-2017.)
